hero.title: Fronten Developer
hero.description: Combining aesthetics with technology. I design modern, user-friendly, and memorable web experiences using React.

about.title: About Me
about.bio: Hello! I am Fatma Resuloğlu, a Computer Engineering graduate from Zonguldak Bülent Ecevit University. I am passionate about AI, mobile app development, and designing user-friendly interfaces. I love building sustainable and accessible projects using React Native, Flutter, and Python.

desc: Spearheaded the development of a React Native mobile application designed for digitally monitoring fuel station operations, including real-time sales and shift data.

Engineered and implemented critical user-facing features such as user authentication (login/registration), detailed profile editing, and seamless theme switching (Dark/Light mode) to enhance user experience.
Ensured application readiness for diverse international markets by building in RTL (Right-to-Left) language support for an inclusive user interface.
Integrated robust JWT-based authentication and securely managed access tokens using AsyncStorage for persistent session management.
Developed deep linking functionality to allow external sources to open the app with personalized data, such as custom greeting messages upon entry.
Actively collaborated with the backend team to integrate real-world enterprise logic, including distributor reference numbers, ensuring the application met corporate operational standards.

experiences.company: FLO RETAILING AND MARKETING INC. ISTANBUL
desc: Contributed to the development of a functional e-commerce website specifically focused on shoe sales.
Significantly improved the overall user experience (UX) by designing and implementing a highly intuitive and user-friendly interface.
Focused on frontend optimization to ensure responsive design across various devices and screen sizes.
Engaged in backend integrations to connect the frontend with necessary APIs for product catalog display and transaction processing.
Assisted in database management tasks, ensuring data integrity and efficient retrieval of product and user information.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Solutions Focused on AI, Mobile App Development, and Cloud Integration
projects.info_block: My other technical proficiencies (Python, Flutter, Dart, React Native, and Azure) have been successfully used in my internships and projects.

project_1.title: AI-Powered Animal Detection Application
project_1.description: To detect and recognize animal species with high accuracy from photos uploaded by the user or taken with the camera, providing instant information about the wildlife.

details.value: Developed using Flutter to ensure a user-friendly and cross-platform experience. The mobile application handles image upload and visualization of recognition results.
A Python-based Flask micro-framework was used to host and run the image processing and classification model.
Images from the mobile app are processed and classified by a trained Deep Learning model (CNN) on the Flask server, and the result is sent back via RESTful API.

project_2.title: Remote Health Monitoring System Using LoRa Technology
project_2.description: An innovative full-stack solution supported by TÜBİTAK 2209-A, focusing on real-time mobile monitoring of remotely collected health data.The main focus is processing data from the LoRa network within the Microsoft Azure cloud ecosystem and presenting it on a mobile platform.

details.value: I managed all phases of the project, including Mobile Application Development with Flutter and Back-End Data Processing with Python/Flask.
Designed and implemented data retrieval processes from the Azure Cloud Platform (e.g., Azure IoT Hub or Azure Storage), where sensor data is collected.
Set up and managed the Python-based Flask API service that processes raw sensor data from Azure, and developed stable and scalable RESTful API endpoints.
The mobile interface was developed from scratch using Flutter for near real-time graphical monitoring of health data and instant notifications for critical situations.
Successfully integrated the three-tier data communication architecture between Azure, the Flask API, and the Flutter mobile application.
